page.title: 06Home Life in Warwick.
page.content: The Warwick area contains 5 first schools for children of 5-8 years old. Westgate First School averages 160 children from a mixed background. A survey was taken in a class of 35 children to establish a typical life style. The children were in the 7-8 age group. we discovered that in this class 25 of the children walked to school, 9 came by car and 1 travelled by public transport. 20 children lived in semi-detached houses, 7 in terraced houses, 3 in maison-ettes, 3 in detached houses and 2 in flats. We found that 16 children had grand-parents living in Warwick, and 18 had grandparents living within 5 miles children owned many pets. 55% of children had a cat, 50% fish, 48% a dog, 20% rabbit, 14% birds and hamsters, 11% a guinea pig.
